description.@en: I join my body with the elemental spirits of air and water, transmogrifying into mist . . .

effect.@en: After successfully casting, you turn into mist, unable to be harmed by normal means. You may pass through cracks, keyholes and other tight confines. You can also hover 3 yards above the ground and take on a Movement of 12+[AB] in combat. However, your trappings do not change into a mist, nor can you speak in this form or cast spells. When you turn into human form, the Spell ends.

criticalFailure.@en: Your body turns to mist for a moment, then immediately back to flesh. You suffer [[/roll 3D10+3]] Damage, but do not suffer Injuries due to it.

reagents.@en: A glass or metal receptacle with a closing lid
